articles.title: Second measles exposure in BGH labour and delivery
articles.description: Grand Erie Public Health is warning of another measles exposure at the labour and delivering unit of the Brantford hospital.
articles.content:
Another measles exposure in labour and delivery unit at Brantford hospital
The local health unit is notifying staff and visitors of the Brantford General Hospital’s labour and delivery unit that it’s been exposed to confirmed measles again.

articles.title: Webb telescope spots infant planets in different stages of development
articles.description: WASHINGTON - The James Webb Space Telescope has observed two large planets at different stages of infancy - one with an atmosphere brimming with dusty clouds and the other encircled by a disk of material - orbiting a young sun-like star in a discovery that illustrates the complex nature of how planetary systems develop.
articles.content: An artist's rendition of the sun-like star YSES-1 in the center, with the planet YSES-1 b and its dusty circumplanetary disk (right) and the planet YSES-1 c with silicate clouds in its atmosphere (left), is seen in this handout image obtained by Reut... [4205 chars]

articles.title: Judge blocks Trump’s election executive order
articles.description: The attorneys general for California and New York are praising a federal judge's decision to block President Donald Trump’s executive order on elections.
articles.content:

articles.content:

articles.description: Max Verstappen has topped the timesheets during the first practice hour ahead of the Canadian Grand Prix, the Red Bull driver setting the pace from the Williams pair of Alex Albon and Carlos Sainz while Charles Leclerc brought out an early red flag after hitting the barriers.

articles.title: Vitamin D supplementation shows promise in treating breast cancer patients: here’s how
articles.description: A groundbreaking study reveals that vitamin D supplementation significantly enhances chemotherapy outcomes in breast cancer patients. Discover the benefits and implications of vitamin D in cancer treatment.

articles.title: Government says it won't release Mahmoud Khalil despite judge's order
articles.description: The Trump administration does not plan on releasing pro-Palestinian activist Mahmoud Khalil despite a federal judge’s ruling this week that he cannot be deported or detained based on a determination from Secretary of State Marco Rubio that he is a threat to national security.
